name: Toil and Trouble (Tiger_Zero)
description:
Play as a witch and make potions for customers!

Note: *In this build you cannot view recipes in game, although they can be found on the Cauldron game object
*the customer will not ask for potions yet
**there is currently a bug where ingredients spawn at a specific location, instead of next to the witch. This occasionally makes walking through the door impossible.
**There is currently no way to respawn after falling off the level.
